reasoning: Esophageal dysphagia (swallowing difficulty of esophageal origin) incidence ~45 per 100k based on hospital discharge data and epidemiological studies. Includes achalasia, strictures, and other esophageal motility disorders.
source: Richter JE. (2015). Dysphagia is a symptom, not a disease. Dysphagia. 30(1):36-41
